00026 
00027 #ifndef SERVER_HELPER_H_
00028 #define SERVER_HELPER_H_
00029 
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 //! Server Helper interface
00037 /**
00038  * Users of the Distributed Map need to provide
00039  * semantics for the put operation using this
00040  * helper class.
00041  *
00042  * The put operation calls helper.combine()
00043  * to perform the accumulate operation
00044  *
00045  * All server helpers must implement this interface
00046  */
00047 class Server_Helper {
00048 public:
00049     virtual void combine(const string entity, const string& old,
00050             const string& delta, string& combined) = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif /* SERVER_HELPER_H_ */
